cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0234

description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of unspecified victims via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0235

description: Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess 7.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a URL.  NOTE: the vendor reportedly "does not consider it to be a security risk."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0236

description: Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to (1) enable date and time syncing or (2) disable date and time syncing via a crafted URL.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0237

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in opcImg.asp in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0238

description: uaddUpAdmin.asp in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 does not properly perform authentication, which allows remote attackers to modify an administrative password via a password-change request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0239

description: GbScriptAddUp.asp in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 does not properly perform authentication, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0240

description: Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a modified stream identifier to a function.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0241

description: Format string vulnerability in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in a message string.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0242

description: Buffer overflow in an ActiveX control in bwocxrun.ocx in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging the ability to write arbitrary content to any pathname.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0243

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Advantech/BroadWin WebAccess before 7.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via crafted string input.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0244

description: Symantec pcAnywhere through 12.5.3, Altiris IT Management Suite pcAnywhere Solution 7.0 (aka 12.5.x) and 7.1 (aka 12.6.x), Altiris Client Management Suite pcAnywhere Solution 7.0 (aka 12.5.x) and 7.1 (aka 12.6.x), and Altiris Deployment Solution Remote pcAnywhere Solution 7.1 (aka 12.5.x and 12.6.x) do not properly handle the client state after abnormal termination of a remote session, which allows remote attackers to obtain access to the client by leveraging an "open client session."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0290

description: Symantec pcAnywhere through 12.5.3, Altiris IT Management Suite pcAnywhere Solution 7.0 (aka 12.5.x) and 7.1 (aka 12.6.x), Altiris Client Management Suite pcAnywhere Solution 7.0 (aka 12.5.x) and 7.1 (aka 12.6.x), and Altiris Deployment Solution Remote pcAnywhere Solution 7.1 (aka 12.5.x and 12.6.x) allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash or hang) via (1) malformed data from a client, (2) malformed data from a server, or (3) an invalid response.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0291

description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities on the eAccess Pocket WiFi (aka GP02) router before 2.00 with firmware 11.203.11.05.168 and earlier allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that (1) initialize settings or (2) reboot the device.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0314

description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in ALFTP before 5.31 allows local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse executable file in a directory that is accessed for reading an extensionless file, as demonstrated by executing the README.exe file when a user attempts to access the README file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0315

description: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server with software before X7.0.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device crash) via a malformed SIP message, aka Bug ID CSCtr20426.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0330

description: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server with software before X7.0.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device crash) via a crafted SIP packet, as demonstrated by a SIP INVITE message from a Tandberg device, aka Bug ID CSCtq73319.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0331

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the management interface on the Cisco IronPort Encryption Appliance with software before 6.5.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the header parameter to the default URI under admin/, aka bug ID 72410.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0340

description: Cisco NX-OS 4.2.x before 4.2(1)SV1(5.1) on Nexus 1000v series switches; 4.x and 5.0.x before 5.0(2)N1(1) on Nexus 5000 series switches; and 4.2.x before 4.2.8, 5.0.x before 5.0.5, and 5.1.x before 5.1.1 on Nexus 7000 series switches allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (netstack process crash and device reload) via a malformed IP packet, aka Bug IDs CSCti23447, CSCti49507, and CSCtj01991.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0352

description: The Cisco Cius with software before 9.2(1) SR2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device crash or hang) via malformed network traffic, aka Bug ID CSCto71445.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0359

description: The web interface on Cisco SRP 520 series devices with firmware before 1.1.26 and SRP 520W-U and 540 series devices with firmware before 1.2.4 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors, related to a "command injection vulnerability," aka Bug ID CSCtt46871.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0363

description: Cisco SRP 520 series devices with firmware before 1.1.26 and SRP 520W-U and 540 series devices with firmware before 1.2.4 allow remote attackers to replace the configuration file via an upload request to an unspecified URL, aka Bug ID CSCtw55495.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0364

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the Local TFTP file-upload application on Cisco SRP 520 series devices with firmware before 1.1.26 and SRP 520W-U and 540 series devices with firmware before 1.2.4 allows remote authenticated users to upload software to arbitrary directories via unspecified vectors, aka Bug ID CSCtw56009.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0365

description: Cisco Unity Connection before 7.1.3b(Su2) allows remote authenticated users to change the administrative password by leveraging the Help Desk Administrator role, aka Bug ID CSCtd45141.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0366

description: Cisco Unity Connection before 7.1.5b(Su5), 8.0 and 8.5 before 8.5.1(Su3), and 8.6 before 8.6.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (services crash) via a series of crafted TCP segments, aka Bug ID CSCtq67899.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0367

description: The administrative management interface on Cisco Wireless LAN Controller (WLC) devices with software 4.x, 5.x, 6.0, and 7.0 before 7.0.220.0, 7.1 before 7.1.91.0, and 7.2 before 7.2.103.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device crash) via a malformed URL in an HTTP request, aka Bug ID CSCts81997.
